entry.title: $2350 // dishwasher and microwave.>#>># Prime Bushwick! This one is dope!
entry.content:
2 Bed / 2 Bath on St Nicholas Ave in Bushwick, Brooklyn. No Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: DeKalb Av. True 2 bedroom, 2 full bath just a few blocks from the Jefferson L train! Large bedrooms with enough room for queen sized beds and all your other furniture! Rooms on opposite sides of the apartment and each room has a private entrance. Separate living room and separate kitchen! Stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave. Prime Bushwick! This one is dope!

entry.title: $2200 // 1bed / 2 FULL baths__Central AC__Balcony__NEXT to Myrtle/Wyckof LM__
entry.content:
1 Bed / 2 Bath at Grove St. / Irving Ave. in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Small Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle - Wyckoff Avs, Myrtle - Wyckoff Avs. Beautiful 1 bed, 2 bath right off Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains. Amenities include rooftop access, central A/C, stainless steel appliances, a gas stove, hardwood floors, high ceilings and a private balcony. Close to the best of the neighborhood, including restaurants, bars and grocery stores.

CALL or TEXT 2 6 7 . 4 4 3 . 7 7 9 8 to view.
